Azam FC vs KCCA FC

Azam FC 0-1 KCCA FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Uwihanganye Hardi

18:54

KCCA yegukanye CECAFA Kagame Cup nyuma y'imyaka 41

KCCA yo muri Uganda ni yo yegukanye CECAFA Kagame Cup 2019 yari imaze ibyumweru bibiri ikinirwa mu Rwanda.

Iyi kipe yo muri Uganda itsinze igitego 1-0 mu mukino wa nyuma wayihuzaga na Azam FC yo muri Tanzania.

KCCA yaherukaga kwegukana iri rushanwa mu 1978 ubwo yatsindaga Simba SC kuri penaliti nyuma yo kunganya ubusa ku busa.

Tubashimire mwese twabanye muri iri rushanwa kandi tubifurije gukomeza kugira ibihe byiza.

18:51

Umukino urarangiye

18:51

90+3' Koruneri za Azam FC

Azam FC ishyize igitutu ku ikipe ya KCCA muri iyi minota itatu y'inyongera, ibona koruneri eshatu ariko ntacyo zitanze kuko iminota irangiye itabashije kwishyura igitego yatsinzwe mu minota ibanza y'igice cya kabiri.

18:49

90+2' Gusimbuza

Sadat Anaku wavunitse nyuma yo kugira ikibazo cy'imitsi, asimbuwe na Steven Sserwadda ku ruhande rwa KCCA

18:47

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane, Hagi Hassan yerekanye iminota itatu y'inyongera.

Azam FC ibonye uburyo burimo coup-franc itewe na Salmin Idd Hoza, umupira ujya hanze.

18:46

88' Gusimbuza

KCCA ikoze impinduka ya kabiri mu mukino: Mike Mutyaba asimbuwe na Nicholas Kasozi bombi bakina mu kibuga hagati.

Hari umukinnyi wa KCCA uryamye hasi nyuma yo kugira ikibazo cy'imitsi.

18:43

85' Gusimbuza

Azam FC ikoze impinduka ya kabiri. Abdul Haji asimbuwe na Donald Ngoma wabanje ku ntebe y'abasimbura uyu munsi n'ubwo ubusanzwe ari we ubanza mu kibuga.
Ni umukinnyi usatira ufashe umwanya wa mugenzi we, aho agiye gufatanya na Obrey Chirwa.

18:41

83' Uburyo bwa Azam FC

Azam FC ikomeje gupfusha ubusa uburyo iri kubona muri uyu mukino.

Kapiteni wayo Bruce Kangwa ateye umupira uca ku ruhande.

Iyi kipe ibonye kandi umupira w'umuterekano utewe na Yakubu Mohamed, awutera hejuru kure y'izamu.

18:38

80' KCCA yatangiye kurinda igitego

KCCA y'umutoza Mike Hilary Mutebi yatangiye kurinda igitego cyayo. Iyi kipe iri gukinira inyuma igatera imipira miremire ishaka abakinnyi batatu basigayeyo.

Azam FC na yo nta buryo bukomeye iri kurema ku buryo hari icyizere byatanga ko ibasha kwishyura muri uyu mukino.

18:33

74' Gusatira kwa KCCA

Bruce Kangwa arengeje umupira wari uhinduwe na Musa Ramatha. Urenguwe na Kato Samuel ukurwaho na Abdallah Massoud mbere y'uko wongera kurenzwa n'umukinnyi wa KCCA.

18:27

70' Gusatira Azam FC

Imipira iva ku mpande z'abakinnyi ba Azam ntacyo iratanga kuri bagenzi babo. Daniel Amoah akinannye na Idd Selemani utanze umupira kuri Iddi Kipagwile atera ishoti rikomeye rifashwe n'umunyezamu Charles Lukwago.

18:24

64' Gusimbuza

Sadamu Juma agiye mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa KCCA, asimbuye Herbert Achai.

18:22

63' Igitego cya KCCA

Myugariro Mustafa Kizza afunguye amazamu ku mupira atereye inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina, bagenzi be babiri barimo Okello basanganiye umupira ntibawukoraho, bakingiriza umunyezamu na ba myugariro ba Azam FC maze umupira uruhukira mu izamu.

18:18

61' Gusimbuza

Paul Peter asimbuwe na Idd Kipagwile ku ruhande rwa Azam FC imaze no kubona uburyo bw'umupira utewe na Obrey Chirwa ku bw'amahirwe make ugaca ku ruhande rw'izamu.

18:15

57' Azam FC yari igerageje contre-attaque

KCCA itakaje umupira ufashwe na Obrey Chirwa asimbuka umuserebeko yari atewe na myugariro wa KCCA, atanze umupira kuri mugenzi we, Abdul Hadji, Peter Magambo akina neza, arawurenza.

18:12

54' Gusatira kwa KCCA

Nyuma y'uburyo bwa Paul Peter na Daniel Amoah ku ruhande rwa Azam FC, Mike Mutyaba ahaye umupira Mustafa Kizza uteye mu izamu, uca hejuru. Ikipe yo muri Uganda ikomeje gusatira cyane muri uyu mukino.

18:08

50' KCCA yongeye gutangira isatira

KCCA yongeye kugaruka mu gice cya kabiri cy'uyu mukino iri hejuru. Sadat Anaku na bagenzi be bakomeje gushakisha abo bamenera ariko ubwigarizi n'umunyezamu ba Azam FC bababereye ibamba.

18:02

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

KCCA itangije igice cya kabiri. Allan Okello akinannye na Herbert Achai na we atanga umupira kuri Musa Ramathan.

17:47

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

17:47

45' Umunota w'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane, Hagi Hassan wo muri Somalie yerekanye umunota umwe w'inyongera.

17:46

44' Coup-franc ya KCCA

Sadat Anaku akiniwe nabi inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina, ikosa rihanwe na Kizza Mustafa, umupira ukurwaho na Daniel Amoah n'umutwe, ujya muri koruneri.

17:42

41' Gusatira kwa Azam FC

Nyuma y'aho Mike Mutyaba na Allan Okello bananiwe gufungura amazamu, Azam FC ihise ikora contre-attaque, umupira ukomeye utewe na Obrey Chirwa uca hejuru y'izamu.

17:35

34' KCCA ihushije uburyo bwiza

Rutahizamu ukiri muto, Allan Okello asimbutse ikirenge cya kapiteni Bruce Kangwa, atera ishoti rikomeye mu izamu, umupira ufatwa na Razak Abalora wigaragaje cyane muri iri rushanwa.

17:28

27' KCCA ihushije igitego

Allan Okello ateye umupira ugarurwa n'umunyezamu Razak Abalora wasohotse, usanga mugenzi we Herbert Achai uwuteye mu izamu ryambaye ubusa ariko uca hejuru y'izamu.

17:26

24' Koruneri ya Azam FC

Selemani Idd yari akoze contre-attaque ku ruhande rwa Azam FC, Gift Ali Abubakar arahagoboka arenza umupira ujya muri koruneri itagize icyo itanga. Azam FC iri gukinira inyuma muri uyu mukino.

17:22

20' Igikombe kiri guhatanirwa

Amakipe yombi ari guhatanira igikombe kiza guherekezwa n'ibihumbi $30 ku ikipe ya mbere, ibihumbi $20 ku ikipe ya kabiri mu gihe Green Eagles yabaye iya gatatu yo ihabwa ibihumbi $10.

17:17

15' Koruneri ya KCCA

Mustafa Kizza ahinduye umupira ukomeye mu izamu, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Oscar Masai. Barayiteye ugaruka kuri Peter Magambo uteye ishoti rikomeye rica hejuru y'izamu.

17:14

13' KCCA ihushije uburyo bwiza

KCCA ibonye umupira w'umuterekano utewe na Mustafa Kizza, umupira ukorwaho na Sadat Anaku n'umutwe, uca ku ruhande rw'izamu. Bwari uburyo bwiza ku ruhande rw'iyi kipe yo muri Uganda ishaka kongera kwegukana iri rushanwa iheruka mu myaka 40 ishize.

17:11

9' Gusatira kwa Azam FC

Kapiteni wa Azam FC, Bruce Kangwa ahinduye umupira mu izamu, usanga mugenzi we Idd Selemani ushyizeho umutwe, uca hejuru gato y'izamu ririmo Charles Lukwago.

17:08

6' Igitego cyanzwe

KCCA yari ibonye igitego cya mbere ku mupira utewe na Allan Okello, ubwo Anaku Sadat yari amaze kurema uburyo bwashyizwe muri koruneri, ariko umusifuzi wo ku ruhande, Hakizimana Ambroise avuze ko habayeho kurarira.

17:05

3' Coup-franc ya Azam FC

Azam FC ibonye umupira w'umuterekano utewe na kapiteni wayo Bruce Kangwa, bagenzi be barimo Obrey Chirwa na Idd Selemani ntibabasha kuwugeraho, ujya hanze.

17:04

2' KCCA itangiye isatira

Abasore ba KCCA batangiye botsa igitutu ikipe ya Azam FC. Musa Ramathan, Mutyaba Muzamiru na Allan Okello bari bagerageje kubaka ariko ubwogarizi bw'iyi kipe yo muri Tanzania buhagaze neza.

17:00

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino wa nyuma wa CECAFA Kagame Cup 2019 uyobowe n'umunyarwanda Ishimwe Jean Claude 'Cucuri'. Hakizimana Ambroise na Liban Abdul Razak wo muri Djobouti barasifura ku ruhande mu gihe uwa kane ari Hagi Hassan wo muri Somalia.

Aya makipe yombi yari mu itsinda rimwe, rya B, ryakiniye i Huye. KCCA yatsinze Azam FC igitego 1-0,

Azam FC ni yo iteye umupira bwa mbere, Abdallah Massoud atanga kuri Yakubu Mohamed.

16:37

Amakipe yombi yishyushya

16:37

Amateka y'amakipe yombi muri CECAFA

Azam FC ni yo ifite iri rushanwa mu nshuro ebyiri riheruka kubamo ndetse yaryegukanye ubwo ryabaga ryabereye iwabo mu 2015 na 2018.

KCCA yaherukaga kugera ku mukino wa nyuma mu 1979, ihatsindirwa igitego 1-0 na Abaluhya yo muri Kenya.

KCCA iheruka kwegukana iri rushanwa mu 1978 ubwo yatsindaga Simba SC kuri penaliti nyuma yo kunganya ubusa ku busa.

16:35

Azam FC igera ku kibuga

16:35

KCCA igera ku kibuga

16:33

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku ruhande rwa Azam FC

Umutoza Ndayiragije Etienne ukomoka mu Burundi yitabaje:

Razak Abalora
Bruce Kangwa (c)
Oscar Masai
Yakubu Mohamed
Daniel Amoah
Salmin Iddi Hoza
Abdallah Massoud
Idd Selemani
Paul Peter
Obrey Chirwa
Abdul Haji

16:31

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku ruhande rwa KCCA

Umutoza wa KKCA Mike Hilary Mutebi yitabaje:

Charles Lukwago (c)
Mustafa Kizza
Peter Magambo
Kato Samuel
Anaku Sadat
Herbert Achai
Muzamiru Mutyaba
Gift Ali Abubakar
Mutyaba Mike
Musa Ramathan
Allan Okello

16:29

Green Eagles yegukanye umwanya wa gatatu

Umukino wabanje wari uwo guhatanira umwanya wa gatatu.

Green Eagles yo muri Zambia yawegukanye itsinze AS Maniema Union de Kindu yo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ibitego 2-0.

Amakipe yombi yari yaratumiwe muri iri rushanwa.

AS Maniema yaje isimbura Daring Club Motema Pembe.

16:27

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo hagiye kubera umukino wa nyuma wa CECAFA Kagame Cup hagati ya KCCA yo muri Uganda na Azam FC yo muri Tanzania.

Turi ku munsi wa nyuma w'iri rushanwa ryari rimaze ibyumweru bibiri byose ribera mu Rwanda, aho imikino y'amatsinda yabereye muri Kigali, Rubavu na Huye.

Umukino nyir'izina ni mukanya saa 17:00
